testcase.name: JSONPlaceholder API - CRUD Operations Demo › Create, Read, Update, Delete operations on existing post
JSONPlaceholder API - POST Create Post › TC 3.1: Create Post - Status 201, echo check, id=101
JSONPlaceholder API - POST Create Post › TC 3.2: Empty Payload - Test API strictness
JSONPlaceholder API - POST Create Post › TC 3.3: Field Echo Check - Extra field (admin: true) echoed back
JSONPlaceholder API - GET Posts › TC 1.1: Get All Posts - Status 200, JSON content-type, response time < 800ms
JSONPlaceholder API - GET Posts › TC 1.2: Sort Order - Verify ascending ID order
JSONPlaceholder API - GET Posts › TC 1.3: Data Types - Zod schema validates id, userId are numbers; title, body are strings
JSONPlaceholder API - GET Posts › TC 1.4: Filter Check - GET /posts?userId=1 returns 10 items with userId=1
JSONPlaceholder API - GET Posts › TC 2.1: Get Post 99 - Verify userId=10, id=99, non-empty title/body
JSONPlaceholder API - GET Posts › TC 2.2: Negative - Not Found - GET /posts/150 returns 404 with empty object
JSONPlaceholder API - GET Posts › TC 2.3: Negative - Invalid ID - GET /posts/abc returns 404 or 400
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › POST Create - Negative Scenarios › should handle creating post with existing ID in payload
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › POST Create - Negative Scenarios › should handle post with extremely long title (1000 chars)
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › POST Create - Negative Scenarios › should handle post with extremely long body (5000 chars)
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › POST Create - Negative Scenarios › should handle post with negative userId
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › POST Create - Negative Scenarios › should handle post with userId zero
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › POST Create - Negative Scenarios › should handle post with non-existent userId (999)
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › POST Create - Negative Scenarios › should handle post with empty string title
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › POST Create - Negative Scenarios › should handle post with empty string body
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › POST Create - Negative Scenarios › should handle post with special characters in title
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › POST Create - Negative Scenarios › should handle post with unicode characters in title
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › POST Create - Negative Scenarios › should handle post with SQL injection attempt in title
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › PUT Update - Negative Scenarios › should handle updating non-existent post
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › PUT Update - Negative Scenarios › should handle updating post with negative ID
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › PUT Update - Negative Scenarios › should handle partial update with empty payload
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › PUT Update - Negative Scenarios › should handle update with extremely long title
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › PUT Update - Negative Scenarios › should handle update with invalid data types in extra fields
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › DELETE - Negative Scenarios › should handle deleting non-existent post
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › DELETE - Negative Scenarios › should handle deleting already deleted post
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › DELETE - Negative Scenarios › should handle deleting post with negative ID
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › GET - Additional Negative Scenarios › should handle getting post with very large ID
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › GET - Additional Negative Scenarios › should handle getting post with zero ID
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › GET - Additional Negative Scenarios › should handle getting posts with invalid query parameter
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › Content-Type and Headers - Negative Scenarios › should handle POST without Content-Type header
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › Content-Type and Headers - Negative Scenarios › should handle POST with wrong Content-Type
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › Boundary Value Testing › should handle userId at maximum integer value
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › Boundary Value Testing › should handle title with only whitespace
JSONPlaceholder API - Negative Tests › Boundary Value Testing › should handle post with newlines and tabs in title
JSONPlaceholder API - PUT Partial Update › should update only provided fields (title) using PUT
JSONPlaceholder API - GET Users and Data Consistency › TC 4.1: Get All Users - Status 200, exactly 10 users
JSONPlaceholder API - GET Users and Data Consistency › TC 4.2: Deep Data User 5 - Verify nested Address, Geo, Company structure
JSONPlaceholder API - GET Users and Data Consistency › TC 4.3: Data Range - Verify geo.lat (-90 to 90), geo.lng (-180 to 180)
JSONPlaceholder API - GET Users and Data Consistency › TC 5.1: Cross-Check User 5 - Compare /users/5 with /users list
JSONPlaceholder API - GET Users and Data Consistency › TC 5.2: Relational Check - Verify User 5's posts exist and belong to User 5
